questions.author: Lana Turner
questions.detail: I have been thinking about this a while and have not been able to figure it out!

questions.author: Humphrey Bogart
questions.detail: I'd much prefer grey or silver, it would match my suit.

questions.author: Ava Gardner
questions.detail: And don't feed me any lines about water vapor or somesuch!

questions.author: Charlton Heston
questions.content: What is the meaning of all this?
questions.detail: I marched with Martin Luther King!

questions.author: Audrey Totter
questions.content: Has anyone seen the brown hair dye? Lana Turner loaned it to me.
questions.detail: I last saw it on my desk!
